title: Markets, Hiring, And Retail Spending
itunes:title: Markets, Hiring, And Retail Spending
description:
Dave Harden, Founder and President of Summit Global Investments, gives his market outlook for 2022. April Arnzen, Senior VP and Chief People Officer at Micron Technology Inc., talks about finding employees amid a tight labor market. David Lukes, SITE Centers President and CEO, talks about holiday spending, retail, and supply chain bottlenecks amid the holiday shopping season. Vidya Peters, COO at Marqeta, talks about FinTech, consumer sentiment, holiday shopping, and digital purchases. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Sonali Basak.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
